parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.74</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Tree View </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Removes an item with given [[Tree View Path]] from Tree View.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Important </title><part><name index="1"/><value> The paths of other items on the same branch after delete operation are updated accordingly and may change. Therefore, when deleting multiple entries, start with the one with the highest index and proceed in reverse order.</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''tvDelete''' [idc, path] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [idc, path]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] - [[Tree View Path]] of the item </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> control [[tvDelete]] path </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] - [[Tree View Path]] of the item </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[tvDelete]] [101, [0, 0]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_ctrl [[tvDelete]] [0, 0];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[tvAdd]], [[tvClear]], [[tvCollapse]], [[tvCount]], [[tvCurSel]], [[tvData]], [[tvExpand]], [[tvPicture]], [[tvSetCurSel]], [[tvSetData]], [[tvSetPicture]], [[tvSetValue]], [[tvSort]], [[tvSortByValue]], [[tvText]], [[tvValue]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
